comments.author: alastantiger
comments.body: Quote from: Human X on September 14, 2023, 05:50:14 PMits time for another pizza day but reversal this time, lm selling 2 papa John's pizza for 1 Bitcoin. BTCInteresting.This is 2023. There is too much information about bitcoin and cryptocurrency and everyone is smart enough now. So unless the 2 papa John's pizza is made of gold or some precious earth material, no one is going to buy them for even half a bitcoin. But good one.

comments.author: Adams0001
comments.body: Quote from: Human X on September 14, 2023, 05:50:14 PMits time for another pizza day but reversal this time, lm selling 2 papa John's pizza for 1 Bitcoin. BTCvegans will be rejected.What exactly are you saying, OP? You're a joker¬†if you think something like this will happen now in this world. Even the previous one occurred because not enough people were aware of Bitcoin or its potential to be valued what it is today. So reconsider what you're saying and just express what you want to happen.

comments.author: BIT-BENDER
comments.body: Quote from: SamReomo on September 14, 2023, 05:59:50 PMYou're trying to be smart but no one is stupid enough to buy 2 Papa John's Pizzas for 1 BTCitcoin. I would recommend you to try your luck somewhere else because on this forum users aren't naive enough to purchase 2 pizzas for a Bitcoin because with a single Bitcoin we can buy so many of those pizzas.People have different reasons to get things, you would be surprised how much people paid for some items that aren't even Worth it in the first place.Regardless I believe this was just a joke and for fun but if this post was to go main stream and may get high publicity many people would definitely take the offer and would want to be part of the recreation of the legendary Bitcoin pizza .

comments.author: Pokapoka124
comments.body: This is a good joke. I don‚Äôt think OP truly believes anyone will take him up on his offer, bitcoin is obviously worth more than 2 papa John's pizza. No one will give this a second thought unless you‚Äôre looking to make bitcoin history for the worst bitcoin trade. It will be suspicious if a new account comments on this thread and makes a bid. Then I can call this thread a scam attempt.

comments.author: Stepstowealth
comments.body: Quote from: Human X on September 14, 2023, 05:50:14 PMits time for another pizza day but reversal this time, lm selling 2 papa John's pizza for 1 Bitcoin. BTCAre you tired of spending your hard-earned Bitcoins on boring stuff like Lambos and moon tickets? Well, we've got a dealvegans will be rejected.Lambos and moon tickets do not sound boring to me. I will very much like them if I could afford them. You were hoping to find stupid people on this forum, who have no plans for what to do with bitcoins. I do not think this is a good place that you are casting your net. Who would want to waste their bitcoins on 2 papa John's pizza when it is no news on this forum that a bull run is in expectancy. You should try to be smart elsewhere.

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: philipma1957 on September 14, 2023, 06:03:53 PMI am guessing it was a joke ? I think it was Internet humor at its worst or at least a mediocre attempt to be funny.Yeah, I think you're guessing it right. If this thread was created only for humor purpose then it's the worst type of joke someone can ever read.Quote from: BIT-BENDER on September 14, 2023, 06:50:39 PMPeople have different reasons to get things, you would be surprised how much people paid for some items that aren't even Worth it in the first place.Regardless I believe this was just a joke and for fun but if this post was to go main stream and may get high publicity many people would definitely take the offer and would want to be part of the recreation of the legendary Bitcoin pizza .I know that there are some people who paid a lot for the items that weren't of any value but they did because of love and curiosity. This time if the thread was created as a joke then that's okay otherwise I don't think that anyone would be naive enough to give 1 BTCitcoin to someone who is just offering 2 pizzas.

comments.author: Oasisman
comments.body: Quote from: philipma1957 on September 14, 2023, 06:03:53 PMQuote from: SamReomo on September 14, 2023, 05:59:50 PMQuote from: Human X on September 14, 2023, 05:50:14 PMits time for another pizza day but reversal this time, lm selling 2 papa John's pizza for 1 Bitcoin. BTC~snip~I am guessing it was a joke ? I think it was Internet humor at its worst or at least a mediocre attempt to be funny.We all know and he knows that no one is stupid enough to pay 1 bitcoin for 2 Papa John's pizza, so it was a bad joke. And that 2nd statement was the complete reversal of the situation. Quote from: SamReomo on September 14, 2023, 08:58:21 PMI know that there are some people who paid a lot for the items that weren't of any value but they did because of love and curiosity. This time if the thread was created as a joke then that's okay otherwise I don't think that anyone would be naive enough to give 1 BTCitcoin to someone who is just offering 2 pizzas. Well, I guess majority of the people who put their money in bitcoin has one common goal, to become financially free and become rich. Having a lambo or any other luxuries is of course part of being rich. The word boring is not as hilarious as the word frustrating when we're talking about hitting that goal.

comments.author: serjent05
comments.body: I almost tickle myself to laugh but the joke is quite primitive to be worth acting.¬† @OP I acknowledge the effort but somehow make a better line next time¬† . Quote from: SamReomo on September 14, 2023, 08:58:21 PMI know that there are some people who paid a lot for the items that weren't of any value but they did because of love and curiosity. This time if the thread was created as a joke then that's okay otherwise I don't think that anyone would be naive enough to give 1 BTCitcoin to someone who is just offering 2 pizzas. We never know, there are people who got scammed for huge amounts of money without receiving anything.¬† There are also people who are insane and spend huge amounts of money without any reason.¬† We even see some managers betting a million dollars for a mere prediction knowing he will lose the bet.¬† Anyone can do a stunt just for publicity.¬† But still, I think this is a bad joke

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: I think someone will take this offer but not for 1BTC maybe I think they will¬† take it for 1mbtc for 2 papa John's pizza. That should be fair enough for 2 medium papa john's pizza.1BTC is pretty huge amount and no one these days would pay such a big amount¬† maybe someone will pay 1 btc way back 2013 but today since BTC is known as digital money no one will take this offer.

comments.author: jossiel
comments.body: What if you reverse that and someone here is going to sell you 2 Papa John's pizza for 1 bitcoin?¬† Well anyway, this is like a good half time break for those that are tired of the market to have some read like this. OP, I think you're hilarious and witty but you know the reality.Anyway, thanks for giving us some funny moments here.

I think it was Internet humor at its worst or at least a mediocre attempt to be funny.It definitely is a joke but it's one of those jokes that someone hopes someone is stupid enough to get behind it. You know those funny GoFundMe projects that's goofy and supposed to be funny but still got funding because it was a meme gold mine? That's like this one too. The best thing to do here is stop trying to think it's a serious stuff and it's just a joke.
